title: r/Maliciouscompliance Want Me To Obey You? LOL OK! ðŸ˜Š
description:
r/Maliciouscompliance I don't know why, but there's just something incredibly satisfying about using someone's words against them for tasty malicious compliance. In today's video, OP is a student with a strict dress code and an even stricter school principal. The principal almost catches OP violating the dress code, but thanks to some quick thinking, OP manages to evade punishment by cutting up his pants! If you like this video and you want to see more, subscribe for daily Reddit videos!

Watch on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iMxIN3WCXdQ
